overview: Charlotte Huxley is an ambitious young woman who's vying for a contract with the big graphic design firm, Cambridge House. In her first meeting for an exciting new project, she runs into her old nemesis from college, Tucker Grant. Charlotte is dismayed but Tucker is determined to prove to her that he's a different man from the on she knew. However Tucker's ruthless assistant Candy comes up with a plan to win them the book cover, but it would destroy Tucker's chances with Charlotte forever. Will Tucker choose his career over the woman he loves?
title: Graphic Content
